page.title: 16Thurstonland Cricket Club.
page.content: Established in 1874 the club has at present 250 playing and social members.It is run by a committee which meets throughout the year.The ladies support group make teas on match days.The club has 4 teams.The 1st and 2nd play in the Huddersfield Central League and the U-17 and the U-13 teams in the Huddersfield Junior Cricket League.Practice night is Thursday.The groundsman is Peter Holloway and the bar is staffed from a rota of volunteers.The club hosts local Cup Finals and Benefit Matches.The social life ranges from quizzes and darts matches to discos.The highlight of the social calendar is the evening when the men cook dinner for the ladies group.
